dotnetType.name: DurationSerializerBuilderCase
dotnetType.summary:
A serializer builder case that matches <see cref="T:Chr.Avro.Abstract.DurationLogicalType" /> and attempts to
            map it to <see cref="T:System.TimeSpan" />.

overloads.summary: Creates a new duration serializer builder case.

returns.summary:

overloads.summary: Builds a duration serializer for a type-schema pair.
